title: Mac client still crashes trying to open
body:
50% of the time opening the client results in the LoL logo appearing but no client window. I have reported this issue several times since the beta client and it is still not solved. 

This also results in the client failing to reopen post-game when set to quit during a game.

replies.body:
Your post game might not be opening if the option "close client during game" in turned on in the client options. Check for that really quick and turn in *off* just in case.

The game not opening at all could possibly be happening from some incorrect admin settings too. Double check your [**Mac Admin settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if that helps or not.
